sentences.sContent: Rumors of such coordination abound, but as with many rumors, they have no basis in fact.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rumors of such coordination abound, but as with many rumors, they have no basis in fact.
sentences.sCn: 关于这类协调的谣传很多；但如同许多其他谣传一样，它们没有事实根据。

sentences.sContent: Finally, offer this closing prayer to the Lord: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.sContent_eng: Finally, offer this closing prayer to the Lord: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.sCn: 最后，将结束的祷告告诉主：愿在你拥有信仰的时候希望的上帝用快乐与和平充满你的人生，让你在圣灵的力量下富于希望。

remMethod.val: a(一个) + bound(界限， 范围) → 所有物品都在一个范围内 → 富于； 充满
